column4: Hi all, i have problem with my flash player on firefox, i want to delete it and install it again
sudo apt-get --purge remove flashplugin-nonfree && sudo apt-get install flashplugin-nonfree
done , and now when i want to install it again after downloading from adobe site i got this message Erreur : Entre en conflit avec le paquet installé « flashplugin-installer »
